roleset.name: seeking, characterized by adventure

example.name: corpus example
example.text: You are two years more experienced , travelled , and adventurous .

example.name: With manner
example.text: She was quite adventurous in her choosing of hair styles.
example.arg: in her choosing of hair styles.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.
